question: When does RKT public initial token sale start?
answer: The public sale of the Rock Token will start on 7 February 2018 at 12:00:00 UTC

question: How long will the token sale last?
Is there a minimum purchase of RKT?
answer: The minimum contribution accepted during any period of the RKT distribution is 100 USD equivalent of ETH. Smaller contribution amounts will be rejected.

question: When will the RKT be distributed?
answer: RKT will be distributed immediately by the smart contract but it is locked from transferring.

question: What wallet should I use?
answer:
A general Ether wallet can be used to store RKT as it is an ERC-20 token.

Important: DO NOT PARTICIPATE IN TOKEN SALES DIRECTLY FROM ANY CRYPTOCURRENCY EXCHANGES. YOU NEED A TOKEN COMPATIBLE ETHEREUM WALLET.
